basics.name: Swadesh Swain
basics.label: Electronics and Communication Engineering Student
basics.summary: Undergraduate researcher and student at IIT Roorkee specializing in Machine Learning, Computer Vision, and Generative AI with extensive research experience across multiple prestigious institutions and industry collaborations.

Experience.name: Virginia Tech
Experience.summary: Conducting research to bench-mark circuit tracing interpretability methods in modern LLMs
highlights: Conducting research to bench-mark circuit tracing interpretability methods in modern LLMs
Advisor: Dr. Nagendra Aneja, Associate Professor - Bradley Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Virginia Tech

Experience.name: AuraML
highlights: Implementing text-to-3D scene generation frameworks with Graph Diffusion Models
Created a text to 3D warehouse generator and editor accessible by an extension through Isaac-Sim for industrial simulation applications
Advisory Lead: Arjun Gupta, CTO - AuraML

Experience.name: Ernst and Young
Experience.summary: Implemented BEAT flow optimization pipeline for business working pipelines using Graph Diffusion networks
highlights: Implemented BEAT flow optimization pipeline for business working pipelines using Graph Diffusion networks
Advisory Lead: Rajat Gupta, Senior Manager, Data Science – Ernst and Young

Experience.name: Robotics Research Centre, IIIT Hyderabad
Experience.summary: Conducted research to develop generalized skill-based models in Reinforcement Learning using Diffusion Models and Sparse MoE-frameworks for VLA tasks
highlights: Conducted research to develop generalized skill-based models in Reinforcement Learning using Diffusion Models and Sparse MoE-frameworks for VLA tasks
Developing Multi-Task RL frameworks
Advisor: KM Krishna, Professor and Lab Head, Robotics Research Centre – IIIT Hyderabad

Experience.name: Koita Centre for Digital Health, IIT Bombay
Experience.summary: Implementing pipelines for RAG assisted content generation, OCR correction and content assisted Image reconstruction for medical applications
highlights: Implementing pipelines for RAG assisted content generation, OCR correction and content assisted Image reconstruction for medical applications as part of the Digital Health Team
Project Chair Professor: Ganesh Ramakrishnan, Koita Centre for Digital Health – IIT Bombay; Supervisor: Kundeshwar Pundalik, Sr. Generative AI Engineer

Experience.name: KonectU
Experience.summary: Implemented foundational RAG assisted LAM model to autonomously cater a student's application process
highlights: Implemented foundational RAG assisted LAM model to autonomously cater a student's application process as part of the early-stage team in this startup, implemented proof of concept models
Supervisor: Kundeshwar Pundalik, Co-Founder and CTO, KonectU

Experience.name: C.A.N.D.L.E Research Lab, IIT Roorkee | BOSCH
Experience.summary: Conducting research in collaboration with BOSCH on Geometric manipulation of latent manifolds of Diffusion Models for Editing, Conditioning, and Interpretability
highlights: Conducting research in collaboration with BOSCH on Geometric manipulation of latent manifolds of Diffusion Models for Editing, Conditioning, and Interpretability
Synthetic Data Generation using Latent Space Conditioning of Diffusion Models pretrained on fixed length data to arbitrary length data, and Interpretability in Generative Vision Models
Previous research experience includes in Multi-Modal model compression, Neural Architectural Search, Approximate computing, Image Processing and Compression techniques
Advisor: Sparsh Mittal, Associate Professor, C.A.N.D.LE Research Lab – IIT Roorkee

Leadership & Activities.summary: Leading open-source projects and research in Computer Vision, Diffusion Models, VLMs, Robustness and Explainability
highlights: Worked on open-source projects and research in the domain of Computer Vision, Diffusion Models, VLMs, Robustness and Explainability
Managed and organized lectures, workshops, hackathons spanning the field of Data Science and AI
Our team publishes research at several A* conferences such as NeurIPS, CVPR, ICLR, with most works lead solely by undergraduate authors

Leadership & Activities.summary: Managing international relations and partnerships for IIT Roorkee students
highlights: Created database of research and contacts for various programs and scholarships abroad available for IIT Roorkee students
Organizing various talk/interview events with partnerships from universities and students from abroad

education.studyType: Bachelor of Technology : Electronics and Communication Engineering

Selected Awards and Honors.title: HOD Appreciation Letter for Highest Increase in SGPA in a single semester
Selected Awards and Honors.summary: Recognition for academic excellence and improvement

Selected Awards and Honors.title: Institute Representative for NVIDIA AI Summit
Selected Awards and Honors.summary: Nominated as Institute Representative for NVIDIA AI Summit, Mumbai, India, 2024

Selected Awards and Honors.title: JEE Advanced All India Rank 1423
Selected Awards and Honors.summary: All India Rank 1423 out of 1M+ candidates in JEE Advanced 2022

Selected Awards and Honors.title: JEE Mains All India Rank 1697
Selected Awards and Honors.summary: All India Rank 1697 out of 1M+ candidates in JEE Mains 2022

Selected Awards and Honors.title: Best Paper Award
Selected Awards and Honors.summary: Best Paper Award for 'Revisiting CroPA: A Reproducibility Study and Enhancements for Cross-Prompt Adversarial Transferability in Vision-Language Models'

publications.name: Revisiting CroPA: A Reproducibility Study and Enhancements for Cross-Prompt Adversarial Transferability in Vision-Language Models
publications.summary: Reproducing 'An Image is Worth 1000 Lies: Adversarial Transferability Across Prompts on Vision-Language Models', analyzing its limitations in an attempt to further enhance Cross Prompt Attacks for VLMs. Introduced a novel initialization technique based on providing better attributes to initial noise using Diffusion Models, Improved Cross-Model Transferability and ASR performance.

publications.name: Riemann Sum Optimization for Accurate Integrated Gradients Computation
publications.summary: Developed RiemannOpt, a framework to optimize sample point selection for Riemann Sum approximations in Integrated Gradients methods. Reduced computational costs by up to 4x while maintaining similar performance to baseline methods.

publications.name: Synthetic Signal Generation with Diffusion Models
publications.summary: Devising a resource-efficient data generation pipeline for synthetic data generation of vibrational accelerometer signals of ball bearings. Introduced a lightweight diffusion architectures achieving 99.7% discriminator confidence against real data, trained with only 100 samples per-class of real-data.

projects.name: IEEE Signal Processing Cup, ICASSP 2025
projects.description: A team research project aimed at finding optimal methods for advanced Deepfake detection in images, submitted to the IEEE Signal Processing Cup, ICASSP 2025
highlights: Advanced Deepfake detection research
Advisor: Vinod Pankajakshan, Associate Professor, Vision and Image Processing Lab – IIT Roorkee

projects.name: Deep RL-enabled Fortnite Agent
projects.description: A team project ongoing under Data Science Group, to develop an agent to play the highly complex game 'Fortnite', using multi-linear ICVF via temporal difference learning and DreamerV3 as world model
highlights: NVIDIA's COSMOS used as the embedding model to embed video streams for training

projects.name: Reproducing UPoP
projects.description: Reproduced results for paper titled UPop: Unified and Progressive Pruning for Compressing Vision-Language Transformers, ICML 2023, for DeiT model, under the BYOP Reproducibility Track 2024
highlights: Conducted Extensive ablation study and introduced enhancements for optimizations
Achieved 90% model compression with a mere 5.5% accuracy drop

projects.name: LLM-AI-Generated-Text-Classification
projects.description: Open research project with Vision and Language Group, focused on identifying AI generated text and enhancing robustness against artificial content
highlights: AI-generated text detection
